subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: With a 25 year-old point guard, two juniors who are six years removed from high school and five players who are married, Brigham Young seems to have the maturity to manage the pressure of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: With a 25 year-old point guard, two juniors who are six years removed from high school and five players who are married, Brigham Young seems to have the maturity to manage the pressure of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
